sent.orig: Teach has the widest use in formal and informal situations and at all levels.
sent.trans: teach一词使用范围最广，可用于庄重的和一般的场合，可用于各种教育程度。

sent.orig: On the other hand, must strengthen teach, team-teach and self help teach.
sent.trans: 以自强自立为目标点，加强独立教育。

sent.orig: This chapter will not teach the PASCAL syntax, but teach you how to construct a program.
sent.trans: 本章并不是教授PASCAL的语法，而是研究如何建立一个程式。

sent.orig: The aims of teach is not to teach.
Allow turtle to teach you about protection and deer to teach you of love.
sent.trans: 让海龟教导你保护而鹿教导你爱。
